name: What's Da Numba?
description:
An unreleased game from 2016 now remastered.

You play as Chad, a douche bag. And you decide to play a prank on your annoying neighbor. Ding-dong ditch her multiple times until she gets super annoyed

As I said before, this is just a old game remade. It's not very long because a lot of it was cut just because it's not worth doing.

Made in one whole night. (Not from scratch)

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Interactions are triggered by simply touching them

I swear to god if I don't get my new Bugatti
